nodes.text: Fashion is a short comic story published in Star Wars: The Clone Wars Comic UK 6.23, and later in Star Wars: The Clone Wars Magazine 7.

A vast leisure satellite high above the towering spires of Coruscant gives the heroes of the Republic a chance to recharge their batteries. The ever-stylish Padmé Amidala spots a familiar caped figure while watching a fashion show – and she's not there for the clothes! Can Mace Windu thwart the Sith infiltrator?

The comic opens with Mace Windu being informed of a time breach, one occurring locally on Coruscant. After tracing down the temporal energy to a small bar, Mace Windu comes upon an older, human male who goes by the name of Rick Owens. Rick, fascinated with the craftsmanship of Mace's robes is completely overcome with shock when he is informed he has been transported to the future.
